Method Detail

activate

void activate(ServerTransportCallback callback)
              throws java.io.IOException
activate the server transport, involves starting listeners or creating of message queues.

Parameters:
callback - - The call back object that the transport calls when there is a message to dispatch
Throws:
java.io.IOException

deactivate

void deactivate()
                throws java.io.IOException
deactivate the server transport, involves stopping the listeners or message queues. subsequently the transport could be activated using activate call.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

rebase

                                  EndpointReferenceType decoupledResponseEndpoint)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Rebase the InputStreamMessageContext on an alternative response destination.

Parameters:
context - the MessageContext
decoupledResponseEndpoint - the decoupled response endpoint
an - output stream message context for the original channel
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error creating the context.
